repeatedChatMessages.message: If you enjoyed playing on our server, make sure to visit us on discord: http://discord.gg/easycompany

serverMessage: Rule 1: No Toxic, Offensive, Derogatory, Harassing, or Racist language.
Rule 2: Do NOT abuse admin reports.
Rule 3: Do NOT Troll, Grief, Spam, or deliberately sabotage your team.
Rule 4: Do NOT impersonate EASY Members or Staff or improperly use [EASY] tags.
Rule 5: Do NOT advertise any non-EASY content or links.
Rule 6: Cheating is NOT allowed and may result in a Permanent Ban.
Rule 7: EASY Company staff can punish players at their discretion.
Rule 8: Do NOT intentionally teamkill, team wound, or revenge teamkill.
